trans-unit.source: API key for Dashboard authentication. Required if Dashboard uses ApiKey auth mode. Can also be set via ASPIRE_DASHBOARD_API_KEY environment variable.
trans-unit.target: API key for Dashboard authentication. Required if Dashboard uses ApiKey auth mode. Can also be set via ASPIRE_DASHBOARD_API_KEY environment variable.

trans-unit.source: URL to a standalone Aspire Dashboard (e.g., http://localhost:18888). Can also be set via ASPIRE_DASHBOARD_URL environment variable.
trans-unit.target: URL to a standalone Aspire Dashboard (e.g., http://localhost:18888). Can also be set via ASPIRE_DASHBOARD_URL environment variable.

trans-unit.source:
Query telemetry data from running Aspire applications.
Examples: aspire telemetry traces aspire telemetry logs --severity Warning aspire telemetry metrics --resource apiservice aspire telemetry fields
trans-unit.target:
Query telemetry data from running Aspire applications.
Examples: aspire telemetry traces aspire telemetry logs --severity Warning aspire telemetry metrics --resource apiservice aspire telemetry fields

trans-unit.source: Connecting to Dashboard...
trans-unit.target: Connecting to Dashboard...

trans-unit.source:
Discover available telemetry fields and their values.
Examples: aspire telemetry fields aspire telemetry fields --type traces aspire telemetry fields --type logs --resource apiservice aspire telemetry fields http.method aspire telemetry fields --json
trans-unit.target:
Discover available telemetry fields and their values.
Examples: aspire telemetry fields aspire telemetry fields --type traces aspire telemetry fields --type logs --resource apiservice aspire telemetry fields http.method aspire telemetry fields --json

trans-unit.source: Optional field name to get distinct values for. If omitted, lists all available fields.
trans-unit.target: Optional field name to get distinct values for. If omitted, lists all available fields.

trans-unit.source: Output as JSON instead of human-readable format.
trans-unit.target: Output as JSON instead of human-readable format.

trans-unit.source: No Dashboard connection available. Use --project to run an AppHost or --dashboard-url to connect to a standalone Dashboard.
trans-unit.target: No Dashboard connection available. Use --project to run an AppHost or --dashboard-url to connect to a standalone Dashboard.

trans-unit.source: Querying field values...
trans-unit.target: Querying field values...

trans-unit.source: Querying telemetry fields...
trans-unit.target: Querying telemetry fields...

trans-unit.source: Filter fields to a specific resource.
trans-unit.target: Filter fields to a specific resource.

trans-unit.source: Filter to show only trace or log fields. Valid values: 'traces', 'logs'.
trans-unit.target: Filter to show only trace or log fields. Valid values: 'traces', 'logs'.

trans-unit.source:
Query structured logs from running Aspire applications.
Examples: aspire telemetry logs aspire telemetry logs --severity Warning aspire telemetry logs --resource apiservice --severity Error aspire telemetry logs --filter "category~MyApp" --limit 50 aspire telemetry logs --trace abc123 --json
trans-unit.target:
Query structured logs from running Aspire applications.
Examples: aspire telemetry logs aspire telemetry logs --severity Warning aspire telemetry logs --resource apiservice --severity Error aspire telemetry logs --filter "category~MyApp" --limit 50 aspire telemetry logs --trace abc123 --json

trans-unit.source: Filter expression (e.g., 'category~MyApp', 'message~error'). Can be specified multiple times.
trans-unit.target: Filter expression (e.g., 'category~MyApp', 'message~error'). Can be specified multiple times.

trans-unit.source: Invalid severity level. Valid values: Trace, Debug, Information, Warning, Error, Critical.
trans-unit.target: Invalid severity level. Valid values: Trace, Debug, Information, Warning, Error, Critical.

trans-unit.source: Output as JSON instead of human-readable format.
trans-unit.target: Output as JSON instead of human-readable format.

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of logs to return. Default is 100.
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of logs to return. Default is 100.

trans-unit.source: No Dashboard connection available. Use --project to run an AppHost or --dashboard-url to connect to a standalone Dashboard.
trans-unit.target: No Dashboard connection available. Use --project to run an AppHost or --dashboard-url to connect to a standalone Dashboard.

trans-unit.source: Filter logs to a specific resource.
trans-unit.target: Filter logs to a specific resource.

trans-unit.source: Minimum severity level. Valid values: Trace, Debug, Information, Warning, Error, Critical.
trans-unit.target: Minimum severity level. Valid values: Trace, Debug, Information, Warning, Error, Critical.

trans-unit.source: Filter logs by span ID.
trans-unit.target: Filter logs by span ID.

trans-unit.source: Filter logs by trace ID.
trans-unit.target: Filter logs by trace ID.

trans-unit.source:
Query metrics from running Aspire applications.
Examples: aspire telemetry metrics --resource apiservice aspire telemetry metrics --resource apiservice System.Runtime/cpu.usage aspire telemetry metrics --resource apiservice --duration 15m aspire telemetry metrics --resource apiservice --json
trans-unit.target:
Query metrics from running Aspire applications.
Examples: aspire telemetry metrics --resource apiservice aspire telemetry metrics --resource apiservice System.Runtime/cpu.usage aspire telemetry metrics --resource apiservice --duration 15m aspire telemetry metrics --resource apiservice --json

trans-unit.source: Time window to query. Supported values: 1m, 5m, 15m, 30m, 1h, 3h, 6h, 12h. Default is 5m.
trans-unit.target: Time window to query. Supported values: 1m, 5m, 15m, 30m, 1h, 3h, 6h, 12h. Default is 5m.

trans-unit.source: Optional meter/instrument path to get data for (e.g., 'System.Runtime/cpu.usage'). If omitted, lists all available metrics.
trans-unit.target: Optional meter/instrument path to get data for (e.g., 'System.Runtime/cpu.usage'). If omitted, lists all available metrics.

trans-unit.source: Invalid duration. Supported values: 1m, 5m, 15m, 30m, 1h, 3h, 6h, 12h.
trans-unit.target: Invalid duration. Supported values: 1m, 5m, 15m, 30m, 1h, 3h, 6h, 12h.

trans-unit.source: Invalid instrument format. Use 'meter/instrument' format (e.g., 'System.Runtime/cpu.usage').
trans-unit.target: Invalid instrument format. Use 'meter/instrument' format (e.g., 'System.Runtime/cpu.usage').

trans-unit.source: Output as JSON instead of human-readable format.
trans-unit.target: Output as JSON instead of human-readable format.

trans-unit.source: No Dashboard connection available. Use --project to run an AppHost or --dashboard-url to connect to a standalone Dashboard.
trans-unit.target: No Dashboard connection available. Use --project to run an AppHost or --dashboard-url to connect to a standalone Dashboard.

trans-unit.source: The --resource option is required for metrics. Specify the resource name to query metrics from.
trans-unit.target: The --resource option is required for metrics. Specify the resource name to query metrics from.

trans-unit.source: Resource name. Required - metrics are always associated with a specific resource.
trans-unit.target: Resource name. Required - metrics are always associated with a specific resource.

trans-unit.source: The path to the AppHost project file.
trans-unit.target: The path to the AppHost project file.

trans-unit.source:
Query distributed traces from running Aspire applications.
Examples: aspire telemetry traces aspire telemetry traces --resource apiservice aspire telemetry traces --filter "status=Error" aspire telemetry traces --filter "http.method=POST" --limit 50 aspire telemetry traces abc123def456 --json
trans-unit.target:
Query distributed traces from running Aspire applications.
Examples: aspire telemetry traces aspire telemetry traces --resource apiservice aspire telemetry traces --filter "status=Error" aspire telemetry traces --filter "http.method=POST" --limit 50 aspire telemetry traces abc123def456 --json

trans-unit.source: Filter expression (e.g., 'status=Error', 'http.method=POST'). Can be specified multiple times.
trans-unit.target: Filter expression (e.g., 'status=Error', 'http.method=POST'). Can be specified multiple times.

trans-unit.source: Output as JSON instead of human-readable format.
trans-unit.target: Output as JSON instead of human-readable format.

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of traces to return. Default is 100.
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of traces to return. Default is 100.

trans-unit.source: No Dashboard connection available. Use --project to run an AppHost or --dashboard-url to connect to a standalone Dashboard.
trans-unit.target: No Dashboard connection available. Use --project to run an AppHost or --dashboard-url to connect to a standalone Dashboard.

trans-unit.source: Filter traces to a specific resource.
trans-unit.target: Filter traces to a specific resource.

trans-unit.source: Search text to filter span names.
trans-unit.target: Search text to filter span names.

trans-unit.source: Optional trace ID to get details for a specific trace. If omitted, lists recent traces.
trans-unit.target: Optional trace ID to get details for a specific trace. If omitted, lists recent traces.
